# Fireburst, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Fire Spells|fire]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a bit of sulfur)

**Range:** 10 ft.

**Effect:** Burst of fire extending 15 ft. from you

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Reflex half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 94

This spell functions like *[[Fireburst (Spell)|fireburst]],* except that it affects creatures within 15 feet of you and deals 1d10 points of fire damage per caster level (maximum 15d10).
